workshoptitle: PeopleSoft Migration to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Creating Identity and Access Management (IAM) Resources
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provisioning the PeopleSoft Cloud Manager using Marketplace
Lab 3: FOR MAC USERS ONLY: Accessing Private Cloud Manager Instance via SSH and Logging in via Browser
Lab 4: Provisioning a Windows VM Compute in OCI
Lab 5: FOR WINDOWS VM ONLY: Accessing Private Cloud Manager Instance via SSH and Logging in via Browser
Lab 6: Configuring Cloud Manager Settings
Lab 7: Setting Up File Storage System
Lab 8: Subscribing to PeopleSoft Download Channels
Lab 9: Reviewing and Updating the Topology
Lab 10: Creating a new Environment Template
Lab 11: Creating an Environment in PeopleSoft
Lab 12: Cloning an Environment
Lab 13: Backing up and Restoring an Environment
Lab 14: Patching an Environment
Lab 15: Upgrading an Environment
Lab 16: Setting Governance Policies
Lab 17: Selective Adoption
Lab 18: Refreshing an Environment
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
